name: Aphelion Rescue Team
description:
The SSOSSISS SSTUDIOSS' contribution to the Mini Jam #77 - Courage.

Help the Aphelion Rescue Team to rescue shipwreck victims accross the space. Clic to orbit around asteroids, and release to launch; but don't miss your target!

Aphelion Rescue Team has been made in 48 hours by:
- @powernoel (coding and game design)
- @shrimpakt (game design and visuals)
- @iu_wat (game design, logo and level design)
- @DrFatalfist (game design, story and managment)
- JB Frau (main theme)
